meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by endogamy.
meanings.sent1: The endogamic tribe only allowed marriage within their own community.
meanings.sent2: The endogamic tradition of marrying within the same village has been passed down for generations.
meanings.sent3: It was quite endogamic when the siblings decided to start a business together.
meanings.sent4: The endogamic nature of the organization created a strong sense of unity among its members.
meanings.sent5: The endogamic relationship between the two families was evident in their shared customs and traditions.

meanings.sent1: The endogamic community strictly prohibited marriages outside their group.
meanings.sent2: Endogamic societies often have rules against marrying individuals from other cultures.
meanings.sent3: It was an endogamic decision for the team to only hire employees from within the company.
meanings.sent4: The endogamic practice of only socializing with people from the same background limited their perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The endogamic marriage customs were deeply rooted in the history of the small village.
